purpose: To enable game developers and researchers to train and deploy reinforcement learning agents within the Godot game engine.
principle: Utilizes reinforcement learning algorithms to train agents within simulated environments created in the Godot engine.
reusability: Easily integrates with the Godot engine, providing a framework for training and deploying custom RL agents in game environments.
limitations: Primarily designed for use within the Godot engine, may not be suitable for other game engines or standalone applications.
name: godot_rl_agents
description: An Open Source package that allows video game creators, AI researchers and hobbyists the opportunity to learn complex behaviors for their Non Player Characters or agents
highlight: Integrates reinforcement learning with the Godot game engine to train NPCs with complex behaviors.
